name: Mulberry Pie
author: WIFE228
summary: I experimented with this and found it was well liked in my house. I have mulberries by the ton. Serve with ice cream.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
In a large bowl, mix berries with sugar and flour
Place mixture into bottom pie crust
Dot with butter and then cover with top pie crust
Crimp edges, cut slits in upper crust, and brush with milk
Let pie rest in refrigerator for 30 minutes
Bake pie in preheated oven for 15 minutes
Lower oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake for an additional 30 minutes
Remove pie from oven and let sit on wire rack until cool
